short_summary: Regional Fire Alarm and Life Safety Testing and Inspections
description: This requirement is for: The Correctional Service of Canada, Pacific Region, at various Institutions in the Fraser Valley.
full_summary:
**Tender Title:** Regional Fire Alarm and Life Safety Systems Testing and Inspection
**Tender Number:** 21801-23-0147/A
**Publication Date:** March 22, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 26, 2024 (5:00 PM EST)
**Solicitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Background:**
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking proposals for regional fire alarm and life safety systems testing and inspection services for its institutions in the Fraser Valley, British Columbia.

**Trade Agreement:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and various free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, and Panama.

**Procurement Strategy:**
The CSC will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price compliant with the requirements.

**Statement of Work:**
The successful bidder will be required to provide scheduled maintenance, semi-annual and annual testing, and inspections for fire alarm and fire protection systems in accordance with NFCC 2020, NBCC 2020, NFPA 10, 17, 17A, 25, 96, 1962, CAN/ULC S536, CAN/ULC S552, and CSA B64.10.1-11. The contractor must provide all necessary tools, equipment, parts, materials, and labor required for the tests and inspections.

**Deliverables:**
The successful bidder must submit a comprehensive report detailing the results of the tests and inspections, including any defects or issues found.

**Timeline:**
The contract period is from May 6, 2024, to May 5, 2029.

**Contact Information:**
For more information and to submit a proposal, please visit the Canada Buyandsell.gc.ca website or contact Hersh Minhas at Hersh.Minhas@csc-scc.gc.ca.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price compliant with the requirements. A debriefing will be provided to unsuccessful bidders.

**Security Requirements:**
This procurement does not have any security requirements.

**Language of Documents:**
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC):**
PAC offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. Please visit the Procurement Assistance Canada website for more information. GDPR	is available in either official language of Canada (English or French).
